title: JNTUK: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: JNTUK Admission 2024 is open for various courses. JNTUK Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on JNTUK Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: JNTUK Scholarship
description: The university doesn’t provide any scholarships to the students. However, a portal JNTU World gives the list of scholarships given by the government and how can their students apply for it. Some of the scholarship programs mentioned are as follows:

faqs.question: Does JNTUK offer scholarships to minority groups?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the college offers scholarships to minority students. Around 60000 people benefit from it every year. An amount of 30000 is given to the students directly to their account.

faqs.question: How is the faculty at JNTUK?
faqs.answer: Ans.The faculty is well-experienced. They provide both practical and theoretical knowledge. They motivate students in the best possible way and help the students to build a good knowledge of the concerned subjects.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is accepted for admissions to the MBA program at JNTU Kakinada?
faqs.answer: Ans.The selection of candidates for MBA is done based on AP ICET. The exam is conducted by Andhra University, Visakhapatnam on behalf of APSCHE.

faqs.question: What is the application fee for the entrance examinations accepted by JNTUK?
faqs.answer: Ans.The application fee for the entrances is as follow-EXAMFEESAP EAMCETINR. 500/-AP ICETINR. 550/-AP PGECETINR. 1000/-AP RCETINR. 1300/-

faqs.question: What is the pattern of AP RCET?
faqs.answer: Ans.The test will consist of two parts- Part A- ( Teaching and Research Aptitude) for 90 marks and Part B will be subject-specific for 90 marks. The entrance examination will be of 180 marks.

faqs.question: Does JNTU Kakinada placement cell provide career guidance to its students?
faqs.answer: Ans.The college conducts various seminars & other activities to help students gain skills to be industry-ready. They help them develop and enhance their personalities and be dynamic leaders for the nation.

Section.name: About JNTUK
Section.description:
Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada is a public university. This university at the time of its establishment in 1946 was known as The College of Engineering, Vizagapatnam. University College of Engineering, Kakinada was ranked 317 among universities by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in 2019. JNTUK has three constituent colleges:
5.1 Minority Scholarships
5.2 Telangana E-Pass Scholarship
Universities many offers like B.Tech, M.Tech, B.Pharma, M.Pharma, MBA, and MCA program. With UG and PG courses JNTUK also offers research program Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in various streams.
The university offers these courses from various specialized campuses such as:

JNTUK Cutoff 2024.Courses: B.Tech Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

JNTUK Admission.Admission Procedure: Rank secured in EAMCET a test conducted by Telengana State Council of Higher Education. Or Three year diploma holders with engineering common test ranking.
Scores of GATE or PGECET\GPAT\ICET will be taken into consideration.
Scores of ICET will be taken into consideration.
